connectionSchemaForm.form: ["instanceName",{"key":"url","isConnect":true},{"key":"username","isConnect":true},{"key":"apiToken","type":"password","isConnect":true},"swProjectName","preBuildJobTrigger","postBuildJobTrigger",{"key":"deleteWorkspace","type":"radiobuttons","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"isParameterised","validationMessage":"You must select this","title":"This Project is Parameterised","type":"radiobuttons","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"queryParam","type":"textarea","condition":"model.isParameterised=='yes'"},{"key":"isScheduled","type":"radiobuttons","validationMessage":"You must select this","title":"Build Periodically","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"schedule","condition":"model.isScheduled=='yes'"},{"type":"submit","style":"btn-info","title":"Apply"}]
connectionSchemaForm.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"deleteWorkspace":{"title":"Delete Workspace","type":"string","enum":["yes","no"],"default":"yes"},"instanceName":{"title":"Instance Name","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-]+$","type":"string","default":null},"isConnect":{"enum":["yes","no"],"default":"no"},"isParameterised":{"enum":["yes","no"],"default":"no"},"isScheduled":{"enum":["yes","no"],"default":"no"},"url":{"title":"URL:","type":"string","default":"http://cape-registry.southeastasia.cloudapp.azure.com:8080"},"username":{"title":"Username:","type":"string","default":"capeuser"},"schedule":{"title":"Schedule","type":"string","default":"@hourly"},"apiToken":{"title":"API Token:","type":"string","default":"b8a76380a0ee3ec7bcdc29e153c2b9cb"},"swProjectName":{"title":"Project Name","type":"string"},"queryParam":{"title":"Build Parameters","type":"string","default":"branchName=*/master"},"preBuildJobTrigger":{"title":"Trigger builds on other projects before building this job","type":"string"},"postBuildJobTrigger":{"title":"Trigger builds on other projects after building this job","type":"string"}},"required":["instanceName","url","username","apiToken","swProjectName"]}

integrationSchemaForm.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"source":{"title":"Source","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins 2.7"},"destination":{"title":"Destination","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"SonarQube 6.0"},"label":{"title":"Label","type":"string","default":"Code quality check using Sonar"},"url":{"title":"URL","type":"string","readonly":true},"analysisPropDescription":{"title":"Description","type":"string","default":"This is CAPE CI Automation Test project for demo."},"analysisPropLanguage":{"title":"Language","type":"string","default":"java"},"analysisPropSources":{"title":"Sources","type":"string","default":"src"},"analysisPropBinaries":{"title":"Binaries","type":"string","default":"target/classes"},"analysisPropVersion":{"title":"Project Version","type":"string","default":"0.0.2-SNAPSHOT"},"userName":{"title":"User Name","type":"string","default":"admin"},"password":{"title":"Password","type":"string","default":"admin"},"version":{"title":"Sonar Server Version","type":"string","default":"5.3"},"clazz":{"title":"Implementation Class","type":"string","default":"com.mindtree.cape.component.domain.CodeAnalysisTool"}},"required":["source","destination","label","componentName","analysisPropDescription","analysisPropLanguage","analysisPropSources","analysisPropVersion","userName","password","version","clazz"]}

integrationSchemaForm.form: ["jenkinsAdmin",{"key":"authentication","type":"radios","title":"Use SMTP Authentication","validationMessage":"You must select this","titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes, Authuntication is required"},{"value":"no","name":"No Authentication"}]},{"key":"smtpMail","type":"string","condition":"model.authentication=='yes'"},{"key":"smtpPassword","type":"password","condition":"model.authentication=='yes'"},"smtpHost","smtpPort","receipientList","label",{"type":"submit","style":"btn-info","title":"Apply"}]
integrationSchemaForm.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"receipientList":{"title":"Receipient List","type":"string","default":""},"source":{"title":"Source","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins 2.7"},"authentication":{"enum":["yes","no"],"default":"yes"},"destination":{"title":"Destination","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins Email Sender"},"jenkinsAdmin":{"title":"Jenkins Admin Address","type":"string","default":"cape.devteam@gmail.com"},"label":{"title":"Label","type":"string","default":"Sends email from jenkins"},"smtpMail":{"title":"SMTP Mail","type":"string","default":"cape.devteam@gmail.com"},"smtpPassword":{"title":"SMTP Password","type":"string","default":"randomtext"},"smtpHost":{"title":"SMTP Host","type":"string","default":"smtp.gmail.com"},"smtpPort":{"title":"SMTP Port","type":"string","default":"465"},"componentName":{"title":"Component Name","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins Email Sender"},"clazz":{"title":"Implementation Class","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"com.mindtree.cape.component.domain.EmailSender"}},"required":["source","destination","label","componentName","clazz","smtpMail","smtpHost","smtpPort","smtpPassword"]}
